lead_paragraph: For three straight years, the Minnesota Wild have been eliminated from the playoffs by the Chicago Blackhawks.

headline.print_headline: Wild Surge Past Blackhawks 4-1 for 6th Straight Win
headline.main: Wild Surge Past Blackhawks 4-1 for 6th Straight Win
